name: Build and Fight space shooter
description:
Build a spaceship with bricks and complete the mission.
You need to flight in space, rescue as many astronauts as you can and destroy the enemy spacecrafts!

Collect the score points to unlock more space ships.

Expand your flying skills to stay alive and do now allow Dark Force to overcome you!

You can build spaceships with real bricks step by step instruction.
Get more awesome creations by bricks with other our apps.

"May the force by with you!” and Good luck in your fight!
